name: imperialistically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves or relates to imperialism (= a system in which one country or group rules or has a lot of power or influence over others): They were concerned that the use of the flag might be perceived imperialistically. Developing a curriculum based only on external ideas imperialistically assumes that someone else knows best.
More examplesFewer examplesEach side imperialistically attempts to encompass the same territory. He imperialistically saw the European consul generals in Egypt as "conservators of monuments".
